commit message: use the same progress bar style in webviews and in PTR views
Add client side calculation of wp.me shortlinks
Fixed small style issues
Switched back to 'standard' JSON methods when accessing blogOptions
add some logging to JSONUtils.queryJSON
More logging

Merge pull request #1118 from wordpress-mobile/issue/1074-use-progress-bar-in-webviews

Use the same progress bar style in webviews and in PTR views

Added additional bitmap creation in ImageHelper.createThumbnailFromUri to create a pixel-accurate cutdown of the image.

Change some of the EXIF method to return Integers instead of Strings.
If a resized image was not able to be created, upload the full size image and add some CSS that will force it to resize in the browser.
Renamed a variable.
Return 0 if exifinterface fails.

Bumping version for 2.7 release.

Do not try to set the location values when saving a Page. Location is not an available feature on pages.
The location helper is not even initialized on page, resulting in a Location object that is always null.
